title: Moss

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Grow on a player's house, giving them basic defense until they are attacked.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Once you successfully protect against one attack, all your protection is removed.
- Players that were mossed first receive priority when protecting from attacks.
- You only visit players when initially first spreading moss.
- You cannot target yourself.

desc:
Post 440
*Green, fuzzy, grows everywhere, what's not to love?*
